summary.para: The DWRITE_PANOSE union describes typeface classification values that you use with to select and match the font.

remarks.para: Note The familyKind member (index 0) is the only stable entry in the 10-byte array because all the entries that follow can change dynamically depending on the context of the first member.

summary.para: A 10-byte array of typeface classification values.
A -typed value that specifies the typeface classification values to get.
The text structure.
The value (2) that specifies text display typeface classification.
A -typed value that specifies the serif style of text.
A -typed value that specifies the weight of the text.
A -typed value that specifies the proportion for the text.
A -typed value that specifies the contrast for the text.
A -typed value that specifies the stroke variation for the text.
A -typed value that specifies the arm style of text.
A -typed value that specifies the letter form for the text.
A -typed value that specifies the midline for the text.
A -typed value that specifies the relative size of lowercase text.
The script structure.
The value (3) that specifies script typeface classification.
A -typed value that specifies the kind of tool for the script.
A -typed value that specifies the weight of the script.
A -typed value that specifies the spacing of the script.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio of the script.
A -typed value that specifies the contrast for the script.
A -typed value that specifies the script topology.
A -typed value that specifies the script form.
A -typed value that specifies the script finials.
A -typed value that specifies the relative size of lowercase letters.
The decorative structure.
The value (4) that specifies decorative typeface classification.
A -typed value that specifies the class of the decorative typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the weight of the decorative typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect of the decorative typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the contrast for the decorative typeface.
The serif variant of the decorative typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the fill of the decorative typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the lining of the decorative typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the decorative topology.
A -typed value that specifies the character range of the decorative typeface.
The symbol structure.
The value (5) that specifies symbol typeface classification.
A -typed value that specifies the kind of symbol set.
A -typed value that specifies the weight of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the spacing of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio and contrast of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio 94 of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio 119 of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio 157 of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio 163 of the symbol typeface.
A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio 211 of the symbol typeface.
